MovieTheater.name: PVR Lulu Mall
MovieTheater.description: A premium multiplex with state-of-the-art IMAX and 4DX screens for a luxurious viewing experience.

MovieTheater.name: Cinepolis
MovieTheater.description: Renowned for its luxury recliner seating and a variety of gourmet snacks.

MovieTheater.name: Kalabhavan Theatre
MovieTheater.description: A classic cinema with an updated 2K projection system and a rich history.

MovieTheater.name: New Theatre
MovieTheater.description: An iconic theater recently renovated with cutting-edge technology.

MovieTheater.name: Kairali-Sree-Nila
MovieTheater.description: A trio of screens showcasing regional and international movies.

MovieTheater.name: Ajantha Theatre
MovieTheater.description: A comfortable theater known for its vibrant ambiance.

MovieTheater.name: Inox Sobha City Mall
MovieTheater.description: Famous for its premium interiors and state-of-the-art projection systems.

MovieTheater.name: The Pioneer Amphitheater
MovieTheater.description: The Pioneer Amphitheater is an independent cinema in the city of Tallapoosa. In 2009, it was rated as one of the best cinemas in the world by Total Film magazine.

MovieTheater.name: Broadway Theater
MovieTheater.description: They have the best IMAX screen in the world! And I love the small theater feel without sketchy crowds and the seats were roomy and comfortable.

MovieTheater.name: Popcorn Scope
MovieTheater.description: Giant popcorn for cheap and rewards card that gives you discounts or free items after a certain amount of screenings. I recommend if your an introverted weirdo like myself but love movies..

MovieTheater.name: Ariesplex SL Cinemas
MovieTheater.description: A six-screen multiplex featuring advanced projection and Dolby Atmos sound systems, offering an exceptional cinematic experience.

MovieTheater.name: Carnival Cinemas
MovieTheater.description: A popular destination for movie lovers with modern facilities and comfortable seating.

MovieTheater.name: Revathy CineMax
MovieTheater.description: Known for its massive RGB laser-powered screens and Dolby Atmos sound, providing top-notch cinematic experiences.

Movie.name: 2018: Everyone is a Hero
Movie.description: A gripping portrayal of Kerala's 2018 floods and the resilience of its people.

Movie.name: Drishyam 2
Movie.description: A suspenseful sequel continuing Georgekutty's story of crime and cover-ups.

Movie.name: Minnal Murali
Movie.description: A local tailor gains superpowers after being struck by lightning and becomes a hero for his village.

Movie.name: Premam
Movie.description: A journey through three phases of love in the life of George.

Movie.name: Kumbalangi Nights
Movie.description: A heartwarming tale of brotherhood and family bonds set in a scenic village.

Movie.name: Lucifer
Movie.description: A political thriller revolving around power struggles and betrayals.

Movie.name: Njan Prakashan
Movie.description: A humorous take on the aspirations of an ordinary man with extraordinary dreams.

Movie.name: Uyare
Movie.description: The inspiring journey of a woman who survives an acid attack.

Movie.name: The Great Indian Kitchen
Movie.description: A thought-provoking movie on patriarchal norms and women's empowerment.

Movie.name: Bangalore Days
Movie.description: A fun-filled exploration of life, friendship, and love in a bustling city.

Movie.name: The Batman
Movie.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Movie.name: Titanic
Movie.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Movie.name: Ted
Movie.description: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted or his girlfriend, Lori.

Movie.name: Star Wars
Movie.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Movie.name: Despicable Me 3
Movie.description: Gru meets his long-lost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

Movie.name: Your Name.
Movie.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?
